Technosis' left hand actually moved a little bit, quivering a little, but t=
hat was it. POOF! Spark extinguished. The Hero runs back in.

The Hero: Oka=
y, I just have to....Oh, never mind, I'm too late.

The Hero walked around =
the messy destruction and stood next to Trinity.

The Hero: Sorry Trinity, =
but I'm sure they're with the Matrix now...

ron: It was fun baby!

  commotion::

echnosis' body::

  Psued=
o: Bastard!

  P=
suedo: For your information, that was my WIFE! 
  Banzai-Tron: Oh, so sorry=
. 
  ::He fired at Psuedo.  In the end, Psuedo was looking like swiss chees=
e:: 
  Atma: Alright, slaghead, no more innocent lives will be taken. 
  Ba=
nzai-Tron: Im sorry, but... no. 
  ::He took out his knife and stabbed thro=
ugh Atma's heart.  Atma fell to the 
  floor next to Psuedo::

n: My work here is done.

ew back to the Iron Fist::
